resources.string: Improve your English-Turkish vocabulary with engaging quizzes and smart learning tools.
Test your knowledge with %1$s level words
Please check your connection and try again.
Which one is the correct meaning of:
Daily and weekly trends coming soon
Trainvoc is an app that helps you improve your vocabulary in a fun way.
This app is developed with open source libraries and community contributions.
You can select one of the categories and start the tests.
How do I reset my progress?
You can reset your progress from the settings menu.
How do I change the theme?
Theme selection will be available soon.
You can reach us from the settings or help menu.
How do I report a bug?
You can report bugs via the feedback button or by emailing rollingcat.help@gmail.com.
How can I suggest a new feature?
You can suggest features using the feedback form or by contacting us via email.
How do I backup my data?
You can create local backups in Settings > Backup. Cloud backup to Google Drive is coming soon!
Welcome to the help center! Here you can find answers to common questions, contact support, and send us your feedback.
Notification feature will be available soon
Language changing will be available soon

The app is still in testing. Some features and buttons may not be active yet.
Trainvoc is a vocabulary training app that helps you learn new words in a fun way. You can test your knowledge with quizzes, track your progress, and manage your vocabulary effectively.
Locked - Learn all words in the previous level first!

Full cloud backup is not yet implemented. Currently, only achievements sync via Google Play Games.\n\nUse the Local tab to create manual backups (JSON/CSV) of your vocabulary data.

For now, please use the Local tab to:

‚Ä¢ Export to your device storage

This will merge the backup data with your current data. Conflicts will be resolved by preferring the backup data.
This action cannot be undone. The backup will be permanently deleted from Google Drive.
This is how text will appear with your current accessibility settings. The contrast and size adjustments help ensure readability for all users.
